name: Cliché Lounge
description: Cliché Lounge at Harrah's Lake Tahoe offers a modern, upscale nightlife experience with stunning views of the Sierra Nevada mountains. The lounge features craft cocktails, premium spirits, and a sophisticated atmosphere with contemporary décor. Live DJs on weekends create an energetic vibe, making it a popular après-ski and après-golf destination.
shortDescription: Modern upscale lounge at Harrah's Tahoe with mountain views and weekend DJs.

faqs.question: Where is Cliché Lounge?
faqs.answer: Inside Harrah's Lake Tahoe casino resort in Stateline, Nevada, with views of the Sierra Nevada mountains.

faqs.question: What nights is Cliché open?
faqs.answer: Typically Thursday through Sunday evenings with DJ entertainment on weekends.

faqs.question: Is there a dress code?
faqs.answer: Smart casual is recommended. The lounge has an upscale but relaxed atmosphere.

meta.title: Cliché Lounge at Harrah's Tahoe – Nightlife | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Experience upscale nightlife at Cliché Lounge in Harrah's Lake Tahoe. Mountain views, craft cocktails, and DJs for golf groups.
